file.name: core.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: API
  description: API de pagos con tarjeta
  version: 0.1.9

servers:
  - url: http://localhost:5000/core

paths:

  "/PaymentProcessor":
    post:
      description: Procesa la intención de pago ya que fue validada.
      operationId: processPayment
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/x-www-form-urlencoded:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/Payment"
      responses:
        200:
          description: Éxito
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/PaymentResponse"

        default:
          description: Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ErrorResponse"

components:
  schemas:
  
    Payment:
      type: object
      required:
        - transactionId
        - token
        - amount
      properties:
        transactionId:
          type: string
        token:
          type: string
        amount:
          type: integer
   
    PaymentResponse:
      required:
        - success
        - transactionId
        - status
        - delay
      properties:
        success:
          type: string
        status:
          type: string
          description: "Estado de la respuesta"
        delay:
          type: integer
          description: "Retraso en el procesamiento de la respuesta"

  
    ErrorResponse:
      required:
        - message
      properties:
        message:
          type: string

  requestBodies:
  
    PaymentForm:
      description: Intento de pago para procesamiento bancario
      required: true
      content:
        application/x-www-form-urlencoded:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Payment'
